recipe_name: Macadamia-Crusted Sea Bass with Mango Cream Sauce
ingredients: +   1/2  mango - peeled, seeded and diced,   +   1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon lemon juice,   +   1/2 cup chopped macadamia nuts,   +   1/4 cup seasoned bread crumbs, 1 teaspoon olive oil,   +   1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 1 pinch red pepper flakes, 1 pound fresh sea bass,   salt and ground black pepper to taste, 2 cloves minced garlic, 1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil
nutrition: Total Fat 31g 40%, Saturated Fat 10g 51%, Cholesterol 87mg 29%, Sodium 222mg 10%, Total Carbohydrate 14g 5%, Dietary Fiber 2g 9%, Total Sugars 5g, Protein 24g, Vitamin C 9mg 46%, Calcium 66mg 5%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 448mg 10%
